review: I have been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes for the past two years. Within two weeks of receiving treatment, my blood sugar levels have significantly decreased and are sometimes even within the normal range. I am optimistic that with continued treatment over time, I will achieve a complete cure. The doctor's demeanor is approachable and friendly, and they thoroughly discuss the issue in a manner that is easy to understand.
